get.summary: Retrieve a Property's description in a specific language, with language fallback. If a description is defined in the requested language, the API responds with a 200 status code and includes the description in the response payload. If a description only exists in a fallback language, the API returns a 307 status code and provides the location of the description

200.description: Property's description in a specific language. If a description only exists in a fallback language, the API returns a 307 status code and provides its location
